trans-unit.source: Defines the period of daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 定义夏令时的段。

trans-unit.source: Daylight saving time is a period during the year when the clock is advanced, usually by an hour, to take advantage of extended daylight hours.
trans-unit.target: 夏时制是一段时间内的年份时钟高级时间，通常通过&1; 小时，若要利用扩展的夏时制的小时数。

trans-unit.source: At the end of the period, the clock is set back to the standard time.
trans-unit.target: 在该期间结束时，时钟重新设置为标准时间。

trans-unit.source: > [!WARNING] > The DaylightTime object returned by the <xref:System.TimeZone.GetDaylightChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method recognizes only the time zone adjustment rule that is currently in effect, and ignores any previous adjustment rules for which the system has information.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!WARNING]&1;> 返回 DaylightTime 对象<xref:System.TimeZone.GetDaylightChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法只会识别时区调整规则的当前正在起作用，并忽略任何以前的调整规则系统具有信息。</xref:System.TimeZone.GetDaylightChanges%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it applies the current adjustment rule backward in time to periods when it may not have been in effect.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它适用于时它可能还未生效的时间段中时间向后当前的调整规则。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve information about all the known adjustment rules for a particular time zone, use the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索有关特定时区的所有已知的调整规则的信息，请使用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.GetAdjustmentRules%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Globalization.DaylightTime"></xref> class with the specified start, end, and time difference information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Globalization.DaylightTime"></xref>以及指定的开始、 结束时，时间差异的信息的类。

trans-unit.source: The `start` parameter becomes the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Start%2A> property of the new object.
trans-unit.target: `start`参数成为的值<xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Start%2A>新对象的属性。</xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `end` parameter becomes the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.End%2A> property of the new object.
trans-unit.target: `end`参数成为的值<xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.End%2A>新对象的属性。</xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.End%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `delta` parameter becomes the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Delta%2A> property of the new object.
trans-unit.target: `delta`参数成为的值<xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Delta%2A>新对象的属性。</xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Delta%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the date and time when daylight saving time begins.
trans-unit.target: 表示的日期和时间夏令时的开始时的对象。

trans-unit.source: The value must be in local time.
trans-unit.target: 值必须为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the date and time when daylight saving time ends.
trans-unit.target: 表示的日期和夏时制的结束的时间的对象。

trans-unit.source: The value must be in local time.
trans-unit.target: 值必须为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the difference between standard time and daylight saving time, in ticks.
trans-unit.target: 表示标准时间与夏令制，之间的差异以刻度为单位的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time interval that represents the difference between standard time and daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示标准时间与夏时制之间的差异的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DaylightDelta%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DaylightDelta%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DaylightDelta%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Generally, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class is a more accurate source of information on time zone adjustments than the <xref:System.TimeZone> and <xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime> classes.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类是一个更准确的上比时区调整的信息来源<xref:System.TimeZone>和<xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime>类。</xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime> </xref:System.TimeZone> </xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>

trans-unit.source: If the property value is positive, at the start of daylight saving time, the clock time is advanced by the length of time specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值为正的夏时制开始时，此属性指定的时间长度前进的时钟时间。

trans-unit.source: At the end of daylight saving time, the clock time is set back by the length of time specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: 在夏时制的末尾，时钟时间重新设置此属性指定的时间长度。

trans-unit.source: If the property value is negative, the clock time is set back at the start of daylight saving time and advanced at the end.
trans-unit.target: 如果属性值为负，时钟时间是在夏令时的开始处重新设置，高级的末尾。

trans-unit.source: The time interval that represents the difference between standard time and daylight saving time.
trans-unit.target: 表示标准时间与夏时制之间的差异的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the date and time when the daylight saving period ends.
trans-unit.target: 获取的对象，表示的日期和时间夏令期结束。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateEnd%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Generally, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class is a more accurate source of information on time zone adjustments than the <xref:System.TimeZone> and <xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime> classes.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类是一个更准确的上比时区调整的信息来源<xref:System.TimeZone>和<xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime>类。</xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime> </xref:System.TimeZone> </xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>

trans-unit.source: When the daylight saving period ends, the clock time is set back to standard time.
trans-unit.target: 夏时制时间结束时，则会时钟时间重新设置为标准时间。

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the date and time when the daylight saving period ends.
trans-unit.target: 对象，该对象表示的日期和时间夏令期结束。

trans-unit.source: The value is in local time.
trans-unit.target: 值为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object that represents the date and time when the daylight saving period begins.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示的日期和夏时制期开始的时间的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性对应于<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Generally, the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo> class is a more accurate source of information on time zone adjustments than the <xref:System.TimeZone> and <xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime> classes.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>类是一个更准确的上比时区调整的信息来源<xref:System.TimeZone>和<xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime>类。</xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime> </xref:System.TimeZone> </xref:System.TimeZoneInfo>

trans-unit.source: When the daylight saving period begins, the clock time is advanced by the number of ticks defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Delta%2A> property to take advantage of the extended daylight hours.
trans-unit.target: 当夏令期间开始时，时钟时间向前调整的定义的计时周期数<xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Delta%2A>属性以利用扩展的夏时制的小时数。</xref:System.Globalization.DaylightTime.Delta%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that represents the date and time when the daylight saving period begins.
trans-unit.target: 对象，该对象表示的日期和时间时夏周期开始。

trans-unit.source: The value is in local time.
trans-unit.target: 值为本地时间。
